text: Big Generator is the 12th studio album by Yes. It was released on 21 September, 1987 through Atco Records and went to number 17 in the United Kingdom, number 15 in the United States and number 14 in Canada, Sweden and Japan. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1988. It has a more poppier sounding to their progressive rock sound. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1987 albums Category:Yes (band) albums
title: Big Generator
